Text: Korean tripI said long ago that I would let you know if we were planning a trip to Korea so here I am Matt sent us info on a trip planned by the army for Nov We have secured spots for ourselves and Matt Information is available at this web site address wwwkoreaarmymilpaocrreunionhtm Check it out and see what you think Applications are available from that site as well We plan to stay on a couple of extra days after the tour so would be there until the th I think Noel had sent a quick inquiry to Charlie Coyote as well but did not send on the web address Would love to see you all again Keep in touch Karen and Noel Muller
